title: Inquiries Removal Expert
job_overview:
We’re a funding company and we provide with 0% interest business credit cards and business line of credit our clients and we have multiple request for hard inquiries removal across all 3 bureaus

We need SUPER QUICK, EFFICIENT and fluent English with NO language barrier person to add inside our team who must be collaborating on our weekly team calls, be part and integrate with the team.

We work on a performance basis meaning that we provide business funding to our customers but 90% of them have hard inquires to remove BEFORE applying for funding, so what we do is remove and clean up their profile so they’ll be ready for the first banks to approach.

Once the first banks get approached if we stack more then 3 hard inquiry x bureau we’ll then create another request to remove the new hard inquiries.

So with 35+ clients a month we end up disputing different requests as we approach at least 8-9 banks x client. Meaning that we need probably 3 request of hard inquires removal x bureau and x client throughout the collaboration.

We make money on a ?e of their funding, so we are suffering a lot now because we spend 20-30k a month in ads to acquire customers but they get ready for funding within 60-90 days due to our hard inquires team being so slow, and I let you image how painful could be for our cash flow.

Essentially we never see profits.

If we fix the hard inquiry timing we can easily get these clients funding in 20-30 days.

Our team is removing experian in 10 days, and this can be lowered to 24-72 hours, but EVERYONE claim to remove experian quick but they all take 10-20 days because they LIE. (even though is very easy to remove, they are just slow and lazy)

And we need 15-20 days for TU and EQ as now they are taking 30-40 days.

We need to remove things super aggressive otherwise we don’t make money because we get money from funding commission of clients and 90% of them need hard inquiries removal before the funding applications


we pay for inquiries removed.
